profile_positions.description: The focus of my research is the follicular fluid surrounding the developping oocyte and how alterations in its composition can impact fertility. The project is the result of a collaboration between the Department of Pediatrics, Center for Metabolic and Liver Disease and the Department of Gynecology & Obstetrics, Center for Fertility of the Univerity Medical Center Groningen.
